definitions.body: lit. base, pedestal, 1Ki 7:31 (like) the work of a pedestal (Th VB), acc. to Sta:ZAW iii, 1883, 161, 162 [[מַעֲשֵׂה־כֵן]] is in wrong place, being orig. part of a gloss to v:1Ki 7:35; —´[[כ]] in v:1Ki 7:29 = thus, or is txt. err.;—[[כֵּן־תָּרְנׇם]] Is 33:23 the base (supportor socket) of their mast (so Thes and most); esp. of base of laver of tabernacle Ex 30:18, Ex 30:28, Ex 31:9, Ex 35:16, Ex 38:8, Ex 39:39, Ex 40:11, Le 8:11 (all P).

office, place Ge 40:13, Ge 41:13 (both E); hence (late) [[עַל־כַּנּוֹ]] in his place Da 11:20, Da 11:21, Da 11:38 (i.e. in his stead, as his successor, cf. Germ. an seiner Stelle); [[עַל]] om. v:Da 11:7.
